root.body: british airway say british govern reach agreement new traffic right japanes govern clear way non-stop flight london tokyo flight schedul cut across siberia shave almost six hour previou flight path 11-1/2 hour british airway say trans-siberian rout subject approv ussr british airway ad agreement british airway say continu leav heathrow daili new non-stop servic oper thursday saturday start earli june compani say return flight friday sunday
